content: k2 m1pr * k2 p2 work from * to m m1r slip m m m1l * p2 k2 work from * to last 2 sts m1pl k2 row 18 ws k2 k1 * p2 k2 work from * to 2 sts before m p1 m slip m p1 * k2 p2 work from * to last 3 sts k1 k2 row 19 rs k2 m1pr p1 * k2 p2 work from * to 1 st before m k1 m1r slip m m m1l k1 * p2 k2 work from * to last 3 sts p1 m1pl k2 row 20 ws k2 * k2 p2 work from * to 1 st before m m slip m * p2 k2 work from * to last 2 sts k2 row 21 rs k2 m1pr p1 * k2 p2 work from * to 3 sts before m k2 p1 m1pr slip m m m1pl p1 k2 * p2 k2 work from * to last 3 sts p1 m1pl k2 row 22 ws k2 * k2 p2 work from * to 3 sts before m k2 m slip m k2 * p2 k2 work from * to last 2 sts k2 row 23 rs k2 m1r * p2 k2 work from * to 2 sts before m p2 m1r slip m m m1l p2 * k2 p2 work from * to last 2 sts m1l k2 row 24 ws k2 p1 * k2 p2 work from * to 4 sts before m k2 p1 m slip marker p1 k2 * p2 k2 work from * to last 3 sts p1 k2 instructions with needles us 8 / 5mm needles cast on 2 sts knit 6 row rotate work 90 ° pick up and knit 3 sts one in each garter ridge pick up and knit the 2 cast on sts = 7 sts next row ws k2 purl 3 k2 3 set up row row 1 rs k2 m1r k1 m1r place m m m1l k1 m1l k2 = 11 sts row 2 ws k2 purl to 1 st before m m slip m purl to last 2 sts k2 row 3 rs k2 m1r knit to marker m1r slip m m m1l knit to last 2 sts m1l k2 = 15 sts row 4 ws k2 purl to 1 st before m m slip m purl to last 2 sts k2 repeat last 2 row until you have 47 sts work row 3 once = 51 sts next row ws k2 m1pr purl to 1 st before m m purl to last 2 sts m1pl k2 = 53 sts body work textured pattern once you have 101 sts work stockinette pattern once you have 149 sts work textured pattern once you have 197 sts work stockinette pattern once you have 245 sts edging section 1 row 1 rs k2 m1pr * k1 p1 work from * to m m1r slip m m m1l * p1 k1 work from * to last 2 sts m1pl
